summary: REQ-38 appears implemented by adding an autoplay interval when there are 2+ banners and pausing/resuming on user interaction, while preserving manual controls. REQ-39 is only evidenced as updated in the HomePage “Why Choose Us” section; the diff does not provide evidence that the word “delivery” was removed from all user-facing frontend copy site-wide.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove the word "delivery" from all user-facing website copy and replace it with service-appropriate wording in English (use "on-time service" and/or "on-time setup" depending on context), ensuring the site reads like a service website.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows a copy change on the homepage, but does not show (or summarize) changes across the rest of the frontend to ensure there are no remaining occurrences of "delivery" (case-insensitive) anywhere user-facing.
